application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Creation of a basement with rear lightwell, a single storey rear extension and a rear roof extension with three front and one rear roof windows. Replacement of the first floor rear windows with timber framed double French doors and Juliet balconies. Two new windows to replace existing to the side elevation and one new side window at second floor
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & access statement,  flood risk assessment, Arboricultural statement, 0770-001-SP, 0770-000-LP, 0819-002-EP-GF, 0819-003-EP-1F-2F, 0819-004-EP-RF, 0819-005-EE-FR-RE, 0819-006-EE-SI, 0819-007-ES-AA, 0819-008-ES-BB, 0819-100-PP-B-GF, 0819-101-PP-1F-2F, 0819-102-PP-RF, 0819-103-PE-FR-RE, 0819-104-PE-SI, 0819-105-PS-AA & 0819-106-PS-BB Received: 08/09/2021; fire statement Received: 20/09/2021; Construction management statement Received: 19/11/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
Condition : 6 - The development hereby permitted shall be built in line with the hereby approved Construction Management Statement.

Condition : 7 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a
separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall
not be used as sleeping accommodation

Condition : 8 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the
person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate
Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 9 - The basement hereby permitted shall be built in line with
flood management measures as shown in the submitted and
hereby approved Flood Risk Assessment.

Condition : 10 - Before the development hereby permitted commences at the site, the protection measures outlined in the hereby approved Arboricultural statement shall be undertaken at the site and shall be retained for the entire period of the duration of any work in connection with the development hereby permitted.
